com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.antialiasing.SMAA

Class SMAA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.antialiasing.SMAA.SMAA

  • public class SMAA
extends java.lang.Object
    SMAA - Enhances Subpixel Morphological AntiAliasing PostProcessing, 3 passes, nice quality SMAA.h, Version 2.8: http://www.iryoku.com/smaa/ copyright-note, see SMAA.h: Uses SMAA. Copyright (C) 2011 by Jorge Jimenez, Jose I. Echevarria, Tiago Sousa, Belen Masia, Fernando Navarro and Diego Gutierrez.
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
